document.full_text: rescuers on saturday had yet to make contact with a miner trapped more than a mile below ground after a silver mine in idaho collapsed for unknown reasons friday evening, officials said.
document.title: rescue on for miner trapped by mine collapse in idaho
lines_and_colors: rescuers on saturday had yet to make contact with a miner trapped more than a mile below ground after a silver mine in idaho collapsed for unknown reasons friday evening, officials said.
